item.title: Gut Microbiota Show Promise in the Fight Against Gout
item.description: Human studies suggest protective associations, but clinical benefit remains elusive. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Expanded Lung Cancer Screening Could Avert Many More Deaths
item.description: Two modeling studies suggest that making more people eligible for lung cancer screening would prevent tens of thousands of deaths in the US each year ...

item.title: Pirfenidone Improves Lung Function After Radiation Injury
item.description: Pirfenidone, an oral antifibrotic, improves lung function and reduces acute pulmonary exacerbations in patients with grades 2-3 radiation induced lung...

item.title: Eosinophilic Esophagitis Demands Whole-Patient Care
item.description: EoE is increasingly diagnosed in Europe, yet for many patients, the biggest hurdle lies beyond treating the inflammation. Medscape News Europe

item.title: When Alcohol and COPD Collide, Lungs Suffer More
item.description: Experts urge primary care docs to question the alcohol use of patients with COPD. Medscape Medical News
